attributes.action: Get more rights for grandparents to have contact with there grandchildren
attributes.additional_details: To stop parents taking grandchildren anyway from there grandchildren when it suits bonds are made and when parents stop contact it is devastating to both grandchildren and grandparents. Children need to have there grandparents in there lives and shouldn’t be kept away because of family disputes and disagreements
attributes.background: Give grandparents rights to have contact with there grandchildren when there parents won’t allow access due to family disagreements and fallouts. Having grandparents around is essential to a child’s life and gives them more security and a sense of stability

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702972
